text: World Without Shame is a 1962 British naturist film directed by Donovan Winter and starring Yvonne Martell.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 p 44-45 ==References== ==External links== *World Without Shame at IMDb *World Without Shame at TCMDB Category:British films
title: World Without Shame
